title: 01/19/22 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 01/19/22 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to The Athletic's Sam Amick about the future of Lakers Head Coach Frank Vogel. Why hasn't management pulled the trigger on firing him yet? Peter Schrager of Fox and NFL Network discusses which game he thinks could produce the biggest surprise this weekend. And ESPN's Ed Werder calls in to talk about the Cowboys and what there offseason could look like.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
